SEARCH
Module org.calcmvc
Package org.calcmvc.view

Class View

java.lang.Object
org.calcmvc.common.misc.MyConcreteObservable
org.calcmvc.common.operation.CommonBase
org.calcmvc.view.View
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<CommonBase>, MyCommand, MyObservable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddLongView, DivLongView, MulLongView, QuitView, SquareLongView, SubLongView
public abstract class View extends CommonBase
Generic class describing a View of the tuple [Model/View/Controller]. Each view is considered as executing an operation.
Author:
x. skapin

  • Field Details

    • operands

      private final List<String> operands
      Collection of operands as strings. Its contents are set by the user for each operation.

  • Constructor Details

    • View

      public View(String description, OperationType operationType, OperandType operandType)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      description - short instance description
      operationType - type of computation
      operandType - type of operands

  • Method Details

    • displayError

      public void displayError()
      Error message when applying an operation. Most of the time, the cause is an invalid operand.

    • displayResult

      Displays the result of an operation
      Parameters:
      result - the message to display

    • execute

      public void execute()
      Overrides [MyCommand.execute]. Asks the user for a sequence (at least one) of operands upon which some operation will be applied.
